sentences.cn: 来吧, 拿出点勇气来!

sentences.en: He added that Sun has played professionally and that " he's got a lot of moxie. "
sentences.cn: “ 他又补充说,孙悦打的很专业, ” 他有充沛的精力.

sentences.en: He’s a small kid, but he has plenty of moxie.
sentences.cn: 他是个小孩，但浑身是胆。

sentences.en: In the museum, we saw the famous Moxie double - edged sword.
sentences.cn: 在博物馆里, 我们看见了那柄有名的莫邪宝剑.
